review: I don't typically give 5 star reviews, but I really like this thing.  Picked one up for my brother when it was $99 and then picked one up for myself when it went on sale for $80 from Staples over the holidays.  I find the picture quality is great on both a 32 and 42" tv and you can load netflix, youtube, and other apps onto it.  I'm still waiting for HBO Go, unfortunately, Comcast is like one of the few (if only) ISP's that will not permit you to use HBO Go with this device (for now).  I have other side-loaded apps that also work great and can vouch that they stream quickly and in good quality as well.  Overall I'm very satisfied with this product and would highly recommend it.  An alternative (if you can wait) is the Slice from Kickstarter, which is a lot like this but has a 1TB hard drive.
